channel.title: NLP on Zenvila
channel.description: Recent content in NLP on Zenvila

item.title: DroneLogNLP: Real Time Semantic Analysis of Drone Logs
item.description: Transforms raw drone logs into semantic embeddings using Sentence Transformers for meaning-based search and analysis.

item.title: AI-Powered Web Vulnerability Scanner
item.description: AI-driven vulnerability scanner that automates penetration testing by generating fuzzing commands and using NLP to analyze terminal outputs.

item.title: ViD-LLM Powered Visual Question Answering System
item.description: Local Visual Question Answering system using Salesforce/blip-vqa-base model deployed on CPU with Gradio interface for real-time multimodal reasoning.
